verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Again, thou shalt say <WH559> to <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Whosoever <WH376> <WH376> he be of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> or of <WH4480> the strangers <WH1616> that sojourn <WH1481> in Israel, <WH3478> that <WH834> giveth <WH5414> any of his seed <WH4480> <WH2233> unto Molech; <WH4432> he shall surely be put to death: <WH4191> <WH4191> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall stone <WH7275> him with stones. <WH68>

And I <WH589> will set <WH5414> <WH853> my face <WH6440> against that <WH1931> man, <WH376> and will cut him off <WH3772> <WH853> from among <WH4480> <WH7130> his people; <WH5971> because <WH3588> he hath given <WH5414> of his seed <WH4480> <WH2233> unto Molech, <WH4432> to <WH4616> defile <WH2930> <WH853> my sanctuary, <WH4720> and to profane <WH2490> <WH853> my holy <WH6944> name. <WH8034>

And if <WH518> the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> do any ways hide <WH5956> <WH5956> <WH853> their eyes <WH5869> from the man, <WH4480> <WH376> <WH1931> when he giveth <WH5414> of his seed <WH4480> <WH2233> unto Molech, <WH4432> and kill <WH4191> him not: <WH1115>

Then I <WH589> will set <WH7760> <WH853> my face <WH6440> against that <WH1931> man, <WH376> and against his family, <WH4940> and will cut him off, <WH3772> <WH853> and all <WH3605> that go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> him, to commit whoredom <WH2181> with <WH310> Molech, <WH4432> from among <WH4480> <WH7130> their people. <WH5971>

And the soul <WH5315> that <WH834> turneth <WH6437> after <WH413> such as have familiar spirits, <WH178> and after <WH413> wizards, <WH3049> to go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> them, I will even set <WH5414> <WH853> my face <WH6440> against that <WH1931> soul, <WH5315> and will cut him off <WH3772> <WH853> from among <WH4480> <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>
Sanctify yourselves <WH6942> therefore, and be <WH1961> ye holy: <WH6918> for <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
And ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH853> my statutes, <WH2708> and do <WH6213> them: I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> which sanctify <WH6942> you.

For <WH3588> every one <WH376> <WH376> that <WH834> curseth <WH7043> <WH853> his father <WH1> or his mother <WH517> shall be surely put to death: <WH4191> <WH4191> he hath cursed <WH7043> his father <WH1> or his mother; <WH517> his blood <WH1818> shall be upon him.

And the man <WH376> that <WH834> committeth adultery <WH5003> with <WH854> another man's <WH376> wife, <WH802> even he that <WH834> committeth adultery <WH5003> with <WH854> his neighbor's <WH7453> wife, <WH802> the adulterer <WH5003> and the adulteress <WH5003> shall surely be put to death. <WH4191> <WH4191>

And the man <WH376> that <WH834> lieth <WH7901> with <WH854> his father's <WH1> wife <WH802> hath uncovered <WH1540> his father's <WH1> nakedness: <WH6172> both <WH8147> of them shall surely be put to death; <WH4191> <WH4191> their blood <WH1818> shall be upon them.

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> lie <WH7901> with <WH854> his daughter-in-law, <WH3618> both <WH8147> of them shall surely be put to death: <WH4191> <WH4191> they have wrought <WH6213> confusion; <WH8397> their blood <WH1818> shall be upon them.

If <WH834> a man <WH376> also lie <WH7901> with <WH854> mankind, <WH2145> as he lieth <WH4904> with a woman, <WH802> both <WH8147> of them have committed <WH6213> an abomination: <WH8441> they shall surely be put to death; <WH4191> <WH4191> their blood <WH1818> shall be upon them.

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> take <WH3947> <WH853> a wife <WH802> and her mother, <WH517> it <WH1931> is wickedness: <WH2154> they shall be burnt <WH8313> with fire, <WH784> both he and they; that there be <WH1961> no <WH3808> wickedness <WH2154> among <WH8432> you.
And if <WH834> a man <WH376> lie <WH5414> <WH7903> with a beast, <WH929> he shall surely be put to death: <WH4191> <WH4191> and ye shall slay <WH2026> the beast. <WH929>

And if <WH834> a woman <WH802> approach <WH7126> unto <WH413> any <WH3605> beast, <WH929> and lie down <WH7250> thereto, thou shalt kill <WH2026> <WH853> the woman, <WH802> and the beast: <WH929> they shall surely be put to death; <WH4191> <WH4191> their blood <WH1818> shall be upon them.

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> shall take <WH3947> <WH853> his sister, <WH269> his father's <WH1> daughter, <WH1323> or <WH176> his mother's <WH517> daughter, <WH1323> and see <WH7200> <WH853> her nakedness, <WH6172> and she <WH1931> see <WH7200> <WH853> his nakedness; <WH6172> it <WH1931> is a wicked thing; <WH2617> and they shall be cut off <WH3772> in the sight <WH5869> of their people: <WH1121> <WH5971> he hath uncovered <WH1540> his sister's <WH269> nakedness; <WH6172> he shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> shall lie <WH7901> with <WH854> a woman <WH802> having her sickness, <WH1739> and shall uncover <WH1540> <WH853> her nakedness; <WH6172> he hath discovered <WH6168> <WH853> her fountain, <WH4726> and she <WH1931> hath uncovered <WH1540> <WH853> the fountain <WH4726> of her blood: <WH1818> and both <WH8147> of them shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH4480> <WH7130> their people. <WH5971>

And thou shalt not <WH3808> uncover <WH1540> the nakedness <WH6172> of thy mother's <WH517> sister, <WH269> nor of thy father's <WH1> sister: <WH269> for <WH3588> he uncovereth <WH6168> <WH853> his near kin: <WH7607> they shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity. <WH5771>

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> shall lie <WH7901> with <WH854> his uncle's wife, <WH1733> he hath uncovered <WH1540> his uncle's <WH1730> nakedness: <WH6172> they shall bear <WH5375> their sin; <WH2399> they shall die <WH4191> childless. <WH6185>

And if <WH834> a man <WH376> shall take <WH3947> <WH853> his brother's <WH251> wife, <WH802> it <WH1931> is an unclean thing: <WH5079> he hath uncovered <WH1540> his brother's <WH251> nakedness; <WH6172> they shall be <WH1961> childless. <WH6185>

Ye shall therefore keep <WH8104> <WH853> all <WH3605> my statutes, <WH2708> and all <WH3605> my judgments, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them: that the land, <WH776> whither <WH834> <WH8033> I <WH589> bring <WH935> you to dwell <WH3427> therein, spew you not out. <WH6958> <WH853> <WH3808>

And ye shall not <WH3808> walk <WH1980> in the manners <WH2708> of the nation, <WH1471> which <WH834> I <WH589> cast out <WH7971> before <WH4480> <WH6440> you: for <WH3588> they committed <WH6213> <WH853> all <WH3605> these things, <WH428> and therefore I abhorred <WH6973> them.

But I have said <WH559> unto you, Ye <WH859> shall inherit <WH3423> <WH853> their land, <WH127> and I <WH589> will give <WH5414> it unto you to possess <WH3423> it, a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey: <WH1706> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> have separated <WH914> you from <WH4480> other people. <WH5971>

Ye shall therefore put difference <WH914> between <WH996> clean <WH2889> beasts <WH929> and unclean, <WH2931> and between <WH996> unclean <WH2931> fowls <WH5775> and clean: <WH2889> and ye shall not <WH3808> make your souls abominable <WH8262> <WH853> <WH5315> by beast, <WH929> or by fowl, <WH5775> or by any manner <WH3605> of living thing that creepeth <WH7430> <WH834> on the ground, <WH127> which <WH834> I have separated <WH914> from you as unclean. <WH2930>

And ye shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6918> unto me: for <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> am holy, <WH6918> and have severed <WH914> you from <WH4480> other people, <WH5971> that ye should be <WH1961> mine.

A man <WH376> also or <WH176> woman <WH802> that <WH3588> hath <WH1961> a familiar spirit, <WH178> or <WH176> that is a wizard, <WH3049> shall surely be put to death: <WH4191> <WH4191> they shall stone <WH7275> them with stones: <WH68> their blood <WH1818> shall be upon them.
